name: Blocks Cash: Win Real Money
description:
Love wood block puzzle games?

Blocks Cash TURNS YOUR SKILL INTO CASH! Compete against other players and WIN REAL MONEY!

After downloading the game for FREE, you can start playing regular or cash games and win real money.

You'll be matched with other players within the same skill level. Everyone will see the same blocks at the same time – so the game is totally fair and skill-based.

Enjoy these awesome features:
- Gems award you bonus score
- Cash-out securely using PayPal
- Enjoy smooth gameplay that will keep you coming back for more
- Enjoy special challenges & surprises
- And many more!

* Cash games are not available in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, LA, MI, MT, SC, SD, TN, VT. However, players in these states can still enjoy fun free games!

If you have any questions, please contact: support@empiregames.studio
